languages.text: "...И примирить двух Волков от пустого пролития крови".

"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."
languages.original_text: "...И примирить двух Волков от пустого пролития крови".

traits.locale_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."
"...И примирить двух Волков от пустого пролития крови".

"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

languages.text:
「…そして2匹の狼たちは
意味なき血を流すことを避けた」
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
「…そして2匹の狼たちは
意味なき血を流すことを避けた」

languages.text:
“……将那两只狼唤走，
勿再徒洒热血。”
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
“……将那两只狼唤走，
勿再徒洒热血。”

languages.text:
« ... et d'un bain de sang inutile
les deux loups détourna. »
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
« ... et d'un bain de sang inutile
les deux loups détourna. »

languages.text:
«... Y los dos Lobos se alejaron
del derramamiento de sangre innecesario».
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
«... Y los dos Lobos se alejaron
del derramamiento de sangre innecesario».

languages.text:
"... Und vertrieb die zwei Wölfe
von dem leeren Blutvergießen."
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
"... Und vertrieb die zwei Wölfe
von dem leeren Blutvergießen."

languages.text:
"İki Kurt döndü arkasını,
Dökülen kana diktiler gözlerini."
languages.original_text:
"...And turn the two Wolves away
from the empty shedding of blood."

traits.locale_text:
"İki Kurt döndü arkasını
boşa dökülen kana."
